core_meaning: Sextile between Jupiter and Venus opens opportunity/skill. Jupiter: growth, wisdom, mentor, law, faith, abundance. Venus: affection, art, harmony, pleasure, values. General tenor: supportive, opportunity-rich; progress with modest effort.

facets.career: Mentorship, promotions, strategic expansion.  Design, branding, client harmony, tasteful presentation. Emphasis: opportunity/skill.
facets.relationships: Goodwill, generosity, shared purpose.  Attraction, diplomacy, reciprocity. Emphasis: opportunity/skill.
facets.money: Scaling revenue, windfalls, ethical growth.  Luxury/beauty revenues, pricing power via desirability. Emphasis: opportunity/skill.
facets.health_adj: Liver, metabolic balance; avoid excess.  Glucose balance, skin, reproductive health; moderation. Emphasis: opportunity/skill.

risk_notes: Complacency or overextension; assuming goodwill covers weak execution.
People-pleasing → scope creep; set clear give-and-get.

applying: Prepare and initiate aligned actions; set intent and book resources. (Jupiter: mentor, expand, publish; Venus: design, harmonize, price; tone: opportunity/skill).
Skill-up or pre-negotiate; clear blockers proactively. (Jupiter: mentor, expand, publish; Venus: design, harmonize, price; tone: opportunity/skill).
exact: Announce, pitch, launch, or sign; maximize visibility. (Jupiter: mentor, expand, publish; Venus: design, harmonize, price; tone: opportunity/skill).
Make the decisive call; accept/decline offers consciously. (Jupiter: mentor, expand, publish; Venus: design, harmonize, price; tone: opportunity/skill).
separating: Consolidate gains, document learnings, adjust guardrails. (Jupiter: mentor, expand, publish; Venus: design, harmonize, price; tone: opportunity/skill).
Close loops, stabilize routines, prune scope creep. (Jupiter: mentor, expand, publish; Venus: design, harmonize, price; tone: opportunity/skill).

dignity_adjustment.notes: Optional: adjust weights by sign/hse dignity e.g., exalt/debilitation.

retrograde_adjustment.notes: Optional: if either planet retrograde, temper extroversion; increase review loops.

en.title: Jupiter Sextile Venus
en.core: Sextile between Jupiter and Venus opens opportunity/skill. Jupiter: growth, wisdom, mentor, law, faith, abundance. Venus: affection, art, harmony, pleasure, values. General tenor: supportive, opportunity-rich; progress with modest effort.

hi.title: Jupiter Sextile Venus (हिन्दी)
hi.core: Jupiter और Venus का Sextile — ऊर्जा opportunity/skill के रूप में चलती है. थोड़ा संतुलन रखें; अवसर और सीख दोनों मिलेंगे.
